description: Defined by a chi-inequality greedy algorithm.
references: Chen Yong-Gao. On the reciprocal sum of a sum-free sequence. Sci China Math, 2013, 56: 951-966, doi:10.1007/s11425-012-4540-6
S. R. Finch, Mathematical Constants, Cambridge, 2003, pp. 163-166.
E. Levine and J. O'Sullivan, An upper estimate for the reciprocal sum of a sum-free sequence, Acta Arithmetica, 34 (1977), 9-24.
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
S. R. Finch, A convex maximization problem: Discrete case
S. R. Finch, A Convex Maximization Problem
S. R. Finch, Erdos's Reciprocal Sum Constants
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Levine-OSullivan Sequence.
mathematica: a[1] = 1; a[n_] := a[n] = Table[(k+1)*(n-a[k]), {k, 1, n-1}] // Max; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 60}] (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, May 07 2014 *)
prog: (Haskell)a014011 n = a014011_list !! (n-1)a014011_list = 1 : f 2 [1] where   f u vs = w : f (u + 1) (w : vs) where     w = maximum $ zipWith (*) [u, u-1 ..] $ map (u -) vs-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 10 2013
author: _Simon Plouffe_
